artist: Guido Reni; Francesco Rosaspina; Antonio Marchi
description: Mary seated on a cloud at top, receiving her crown from Jesus and God the Father, surrounded by cherubs; below four saints, left to right, Catherine, John the Evangelist, John the Baptist and Benedict
marks:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Below image i See Inscriptions
title: The Coronation of the Virgin Mary with Saints John the Baptist, John the Evangelist, Benedict and Catherine
